      1 @keyframes header_ripple_effect {
      2   from {
      3     background-image: radial-gradient(circle farthest-corner at center, #282A33 0%, transparent 0%);
      4   }
      5   to {
      6     background-image: radial-gradient(circle farthest-corner at center, #282A33 100%, transparent 0%);
      7   }
      8 }

     10 @keyframes ripple_effect {
     11   from {

     13   }
     14   to {
     15     background-image: radial-gradient(circle farthest-corner at center, rgba(211, 218, 227, 0.1) 100%, transparent 0%);
